alert.note: Alert for Kershaw; Richland (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 26 at 5:59PM EDT until August 26 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL RICHLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN KERSHAW COUNTIES... At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Villages at Sandhill, or near Columbia, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Forest Acres, Dentsville, Arcadia Lakes, Woodfield, Sesquicentennial State Park, Lake Carolina, Elgin, Villages at Sandhill, Fort Jackson, Fort Jackson Cantonment Area, and Fort Jackson Wildcat Road. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 73 and 87. Interstate 77 between mile markers 12 and 19. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
